mapper.select: SELECT sg.BOX_SEQ, sl.STORAGE_ID, sl.STORAGE_NAME, sl.SUBWAY, sl.DETAIL, sg.IN_USER, sg.OUT_USER, TO_CHAR(sg.IN_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') AS IN_TIME, TO_CHAR(sg.EX_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS EX_TIME, sg.COST_CODE, sg.CATEGORY_CODE, sg.EXTEND_CNT, CASE WHEN sg.EX_TIME >= SYSDATE THEN 0 WHEN sg.EX_TIME < SYSDATE THEN ROUND((SYSDATE - sg.EX_TIME)*24) END AS OVERTIME FROM STORAGE_GOODS sg JOIN STORAGEBOX_LIST sl ON sg.STORAGE_ID = sl.STORAGE_ID WHERE IN_USER = #{email} OR OUT_USER = #{email}
SELECT c.COST_CODE as costCode, c.COST as cost FROM COST c LEFT JOIN STORAGE_GOODS sg ON c.COST_CODE = sg.COST_CODE WHERE sg.OUT_USER = #{email}
SELECT STORAGE_NAME, ADDRESS, SUBWAY, DETAIL, MANAGER FROM STORAGEBOX_LIST WHERE STORAGE_ID= #{storageId}
SELECT TIME_TABLE_SEQ FROM TIME_TABLE WHERE START_STATION = #{subway}
SELECT EMAIL, NAME FROM "MEMBER" WHERE AUTH = 80
SELECT SUBWAY FROM STORAGEBOX_LIST WHERE STORAGE_ID = ( SELECT CURRENT_LOC FROM DELIVERYMAN WHERE DELIVERYMAN_ID = #{deliverymanId})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DELIVERY WHERE DELIVERYMAN_ID = #{deliverymanId}
SELECT SUM(DURATION) FROM TIME_TABLE WHERE TIME_TABLE_SEQ BETWEEN #{startSeq} AND #{arriveSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE STORAGE_GOODS SET DELIVERY_CODE = 'YMD'||TO_CHAR(DELIVERY_CODE_SEQ.NEXTVAL), CATEGORY_CODE = 'D', MESSAGE = #{message} WHERE BOX_SEQ = #{boxSeq} AND STORAGE_ID = #{storageId}
mapper.select: SELECT DELIVERY_CODE FROM STORAGE_GOODS WHERE BOX_SEQ = #{boxSeq} AND STORAGE_ID = #{storageId}
mapper.update: UPDATE COST SET COST = COST + ( SELECT DELIVERY_COST FROM DELIVERY WHERE DELIVERY_CODE = ( SELECT DELIVERY_CODE FROM STORAGE_GOODS WHERE BOX_SEQ = #{boxSeq} AND STORAGE_ID = #{storageId})) WHERE COST_CODE = (SELECT COST_CODE FROM STORAGE_GOODS WHERE BOX_SEQ = #{boxSeq} AND STORAGE_ID = #{storageId})
mapper.select: SELECT STORAGE_GOODS.BOX_SEQ, STORAGEBOX_LIST.STORAGE_NAME, STORAGEBOX_LIST.SUBWAY, STORAGEBOX_LIST.DETAIL, DELIVERY.DELIVERYMAN_ID, TO_CHAR(DELIVERY.DELIVERY_ARRIVE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FROM DELIVERY JOIN STORAGE_GOODS ON DELIVERY.DELIVERY_CODE = STORAGE_GOODS.DELIVERY_CODE JOIN STORAGEBOX_LIST ON DELIVERY.OUTBOX_ID = STORAGEBOX_LIST.STORAGE_ID WHERE IN_USER = #{email} OR OUT_USER = #{email}
